pages.title: Death Handling
pages.text: When your companion dies, their inventory and equipment are NOT dropped. Instead, everything is saved to the Soul Crystal's death cache.$(br2)Use the Soul Crystal again to respawn the companion â€” all items and equipment will be fully restored.$(br2)$(bold)Note:$() Death data is stored in memory and will be lost on server restart. Resummon your companion promptly after death.
